title: IP being to high
body: My IP is when i log into league is high than my actual IP number, is there a way to fix this or do i have to just let it be

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct, swapping over to the *Legacy Client* from the login screen should resolve this if you take a quick visit to the store.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked!
Try to log into the old client and it should update your IP value.
